item.title: Sierra Wireless Collaborates with Verizon and Altair to Deliver Category M1 Wireless Module for Use on Verizon’s 4G LTE Network
item.description: [Business Wire] - Sierra Wireless , a leading provider of fully integrated end-to-end solutions for Internet of Things applications, today announced AirPrime® modules for Verizon’s LTE Category M1 wireless network.

Sierra Wireless to Participate in 19th Annual Needham Growth Conference
item.description: [Business Wire] - Sierra Wireless today announced its participation in the Needham Growth Conference, which will be held at the Lotte New York Palace Hotel, New York, NY, January 10-12, 2017.

item.title: Sierra Wireless Establishes Automatic Share Purchase Plan
item.description: [Business Wire] - Sierra Wireless , a leading provider of fully integrated end-to-end solutions for Internet of Things applications, today announced that, in connection with its previously announced normal course issuer bid to purchase for cancellation up to 3,149,199 of its common shares , it entered into an automatic share purchase plan with a designated broker to allow for the purchase of Common Shares under the ...

item.title: Sierra Wireless Introduces Industry’s Highest-Performance, Lowest-Power Industrial LTE Gateway
item.description: [Business Wire] - Sierra Wireless , a leading provider of fully integrated end-to-end solutions for Internet of Things applications, today announced availability of the high-performance AirLink® RV50X LTE-Advanced industrial gateway.

item.title: Sierra Wireless FX30 Programmable IoT Gateway Redefines Connectivity and Intelligence for Machines
item.description: [Business Wire] - Sierra Wireless , a leading provider of fully integrated end-to-end solutions for Internet of Things applications, today announced the availability of the FX30, the industry’s smallest, most flexible and rugged programmable cellular gateway.
